verses.text: 耶穌基督的僕人，雅各的兄弟猶大，寫信給那些被召的人，就是在父 神裡蒙愛，並且為了耶穌基督而蒙保守的人。

words.note: Implies being called by God.
Refers to God the Father.
The space indicates honorific usage for 'God'.
Often used in a spiritual context.

words.definition: for the sake of, in order to

words.note: Implies being preserved by God.

verses.heading: Salutation

verses.text: 願憐憫、平安、慈愛多多加給你們。

words.note: Reduplication intensifies meaning.

verses.text: 親愛的，儘管我曾經迫切地想寫信給你們，論到我們共享的救恩；現在我更覺得必須寫信勸勉你們，要竭力維護從前一次就全交給了聖徒的信仰，

words.note: Lit. 'saving grace'.

verses.heading: Condemnation of the False Teachers

verses.text: 因為有人已經混進你們中間，他們就是早被判定受刑的不敬虔的人。這些人把我們 神的恩典當作放縱情慾的藉口，並且否認獨一的主宰我們的主耶穌基督。

words.note: Lit. 'to be judged and determined'.
The space indicates honorific usage for 'God'.

verses.text: 雖然這一切事情你們都早已知道，我仍然要提醒你們：從前主從埃及地把人民救出來，跟著就把那些不信的人除滅了。
還有，那不守本位擅離自己居所的天使，主就用永遠的鎖鍊把他們拘留在黑暗裡，直到那大日子的審判。

words: Often used in religious contexts to refer to one's appointed place or role.

words.note: Lit. 'heavenly messenger'.
Refers to God or Christ in Christian contexts.
Introduces the object of a verb, similar to 'with' or 'by'.
Refers to the Day of Judgment in prophetic literature.

verses.text: 又像所多瑪、蛾摩拉和周圍城市的人，與他們一樣的淫亂，隨從逆性的情慾，以致遭受永火的刑罰，成了後世的鑒戒。

words.note: Refers to sexual immorality.
Refers to desires contrary to natural order.
Often implies sinful or fleshly desires.

words.definition: so that, with the result that

words.note: An example serving as a warning.

verses.text: 雖然是這樣，這些醉生夢死的人還是照樣玷污身體，藐視主權，毀謗尊榮。

words.note: Idiom describing a dissipated, meaningless existence.

words.definition: in the same way, as before

verses.text: 就是天使長米迦勒為了摩西的屍體與魔鬼爭論的時候，尚且不敢用毀謗的話定他的罪，只說：「主責備你！」

words.note: Refers to God or Christ in Christian contexts.

verses.text: 但這些人毀謗他們所不知道的，他們只知道按本性所能領悟的事，好像沒有理性的禽獸，就在這些事上敗壞了自己。

words.note: Used before a verb to form a nominalized phrase.
Used before a verb to form a nominalized phrase.

verses.text: 他們有禍了，因為他們走上了該隱的道路，又為了財利闖進巴蘭的歧途，並且在可拉的背叛中滅亡了。

words.note: Lit. 'have calamity'

words.definition: for the sake of, in order to

words.note: Refers to selfish or unrighteous gain.

verses.text: 這些人膽敢與你們同席，他們只顧餵飽（「餵飽」或譯「牧養」）自己，是你們愛筵中的暗礁；是無雨的浮雲，隨風飄蕩；是秋天不結果子的樹，連根拔起，死而又死；

words.note: Refers to sharing a meal, especially in a religious context.
Contextually, implies selfish feeding.
Refers to pastoral care and feeding.
A communal meal in early Christian communities.

words.definition: carried by wind, with the wind

words.note: An idiom emphasizing complete spiritual death.

verses.text: 是海中的狂浪，濺起了自己可恥的泡沫；是流蕩的星，有漆黑的幽暗永遠為他們存留。

words.note: Often used in a spiritual or metaphorical sense.

verses.text: 亞當的第七世孫以諾，也曾經預言這些人說：「看，主必同他的千萬聖者降臨，

words.note: Refers to God or Jesus Christ.
Used idiomatically for a very large number.

verses.text: 要審判眾人，又要定所有不敬虔的人的罪，因為他們妄行各樣不敬虔的事，並且說了種種剛愎的話頂撞 神。」

words.note: Implies arrogance and self-will, often in defiance of authority.
A blank space used in Chinese Bibles to show reverence before the name of God.

verses.text: 這些人常發牢騷，怨天尤人，順著自己的私慾行事，口說誇張的話，為了利益就不惜阿諛奉承。

words.note: Lit. 'blame heaven and human'
Emphasizes speaking with the mouth.

verses.text: 但你們呢，親愛的，你們要記住我們主耶穌基督的使徒從前所說的話。

words.note: Refers to God or Jesus in Christian contexts.
Refers to the specific group of Christ's apostles.
所 + V + 的 forms a nominalized clause, 'that which is V-ed'.

verses.heading: Exhortation to the Faithful

verses.text: 他們曾經對你們說：「末世必有好譏笑人的人，隨著自己不敬虔的私慾行事。」

words.note: 好 (hào) means 'fond of, to like'.

verses.text: 這些人分黨結派，是屬血氣的，沒有聖靈。

words.note: In biblical context, refers to the sinful human nature.

verses.text: 但你們呢，親愛的，你們要在至聖的信仰上建立自己，在聖靈裡禱告，
要保守自己在 神的愛中，仰望我們主耶穌基督的憐憫，直到永生。

words.note: The space before 神 is a traditional mark of reverence.

verses.text: 有些人心裡疑惑，你們要憐憫他們；
有些人你們要拯救，把他們從火中搶救出來；又有些人你們要戰戰兢兢地憐憫他們，連染上情慾污漬的衣服也應當憎惡。

words.definition: trembling with fear, with great caution
words.note: An idiom emphasizing extreme fear or caution.

verses.text: 願榮耀、威嚴、能力、權柄，藉著我們的主耶穌基督，從萬世以前，及現在，直到永永遠遠，歸給獨一的 神我們的救主。他能保守你們不至跌倒，使你們毫無瑕疵、歡然站在他榮光之前。阿們。

words.note: A reduplicative idiom emphasizing eternity.

words.definition: to be attributed to, belong to

words.note: The space before 神 is a traditional mark of reverence.

words.definition: not to the extent of, lest

words.note: Hebrew transliteration meaning 'so be it'.

verses.heading: Final Blessing
